verse.gurmukhi: BrMq DUr BUrxM bmMq sRoxqM muKM ]
verse.unicode: ਭਰੰਤ ਧੂਰ ਭੂਰਣੰ ਬਮੰਤ ਸ੍ਰੋਣਤੰ ਮੁਖੰ ॥

en.bdb: The warriors being shot by arrows quickly began to fall on the earth, the dust clung to their bodies and the blood oozed out from their mouths

ss.gurmukhi: (aunRhw dy) srIr lhU nwl gVu`c hn Aqy (rx iv`c) frwauxI Awvwz ho rhI hY।
